TextView.android:text:
Motion Tracker ASU is a graduation project for a group of students at the Faculty of Engineering, Ain Shams University for the year 2021 To participate in the development of laboratories and help students

Students who developed the project:

 Abdelhady ElSakka
 Marc Sherif
 Abdelrahman Magdy
 Mohammad Frahaat

 Under supervision of:

 Dr. Mohammed Ibrahim Awad
 Dr. Adel El-Sabbagh
